      • velAt(spk: Spk; time: float64; target, observer: int): DVec3
  Source   Edit

Reads SPICE SPK DAF files. SPK files have .bsp extention. You can download many of the SPK files here: https://naif.jpl.nasa.gov/pub/naif/

Based on the work by arrieta: https://gist.githubusercontent.com/arrieta/c2b56f1e2277a6fede6d1afbc85095fb/raw/70c43dd28804be9ba9f7c604fe3ad2742f8fa753/spk.py

simple

  rend*: uint32
